articles.title: World population hits 8bn, but falling births mean slower growth ahead - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Shrinking demographic dividend confronts nations with economic challenge
articles.content:
TOKYO -- The world population has reached 8 billion people, the United Nations estimates, crossing a new milestone as growth drops to a postwar low.
